channel.title: Fry Cry 3 on KrolTech

item.title: Far Cry 3, NZBMatrix, jqEasing, Functions as parameters?!
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: Forgot to mention I picked up Far Cry 3 last week and I’ve been playing it a lot. Its really a fun game. Very open ended, very sandbox. It seems like they finally nailed the balance with the island, the open ended gameplay, gun play, and fun action (I wanted so much to love Far Cry 2 but it just never happened). There are definitely moments where Iâ€™m reminded of Skyrim, which is a good thing!
